entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
